column5: This was mentioned a few months ago, and a lot of people here have read his book. PBS is running their pledge drive right now, and showing this video.

OK Tom what does that relate to in Expressvu Channel???  Thanks for the heads up. Funny the other day I was thinking of that book thread and I want to go back to the old site and copy all the suggestions if I can find them.  Mike
i read the book.  Pretty amazing what he did up there.  Cool spot too.
